headline: American Express Company (AXP): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on American Express Company on Rigatoni Capital’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on AXP. American Express Company’s share was trading at $360.31 as of December 1st. AXP’s trailing and forward P/E were 24.20 and 20.53 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. headline: Is Softer Analyst Sentiment Before Earnings Quietly Reframing American Express’ (AXP) Growth Narrative?
summary: In recent days, American Express has faced softer analyst sentiment ahead of its upcoming earnings release, with forecasts calling for earnings per share growth of 17.76% and revenue growth close to 10%. The slight downward revisions to analyst estimates and a consensus hold rating underscore how expectations management and sentiment can meaningfully influence investor behavior, even when growth is still projected. Next, we’ll examine how these slightly weaker analyst estimates ahead of...

headline: Barclays warns interchange fee overhaul could threaten airlines’ loyalty revenue
summary: Investing.com -- Proposed changes to U.S. credit-card interchange fees could disrupt the financial structure of airline loyalty programs and slow growth in co-branded rewards cards, according to analysts at Barclays assessing an industry that has increasingly relied on bank partnerships for revenue since 2019.

headline: Flexbase takes on Amex
